trans-unit.source: Represents a name and value pair used to correlate messages to specific receiving activities.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en og verdipar som brukes til å sammenligne meldinger til bestemte mottak aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] CorrelationProperty classes are defined as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> properties of Workflow Connection Service activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]CorrelationProperty klasser som er definert som <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>Egenskaper for arbeidsflyten tilkoblingen tjenestene.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>

trans-unit.source: By default, these properties are bound to variables declared at the root workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene er som standard bundet til variabler som er deklarert på arbeidsflytaktivitet roten.

trans-unit.source: For dynamic activities such as <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> each of its children cannot share a universal CorrelationProperty object.
trans-unit.target: For dynamiske aktiviteter som <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>og <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>hver av underordnede kan ikke dele et universal CorrelationProperty-objekt.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>

trans-unit.source: Consider the scenario where each task inside a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> has to manage its own conversation.
trans-unit.target: La oss se scenario der hver oppgaven i en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>har til å administrere sin egen samtalen.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>

trans-unit.source: The child activities inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> requires a CorrelationProperty instance unique per execution context, or per task.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede aktivitetene i den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>krever en unik per utføringskontekst eller per oppgaven CorrelationProperty-forekomst.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>

trans-unit.source: In order to accomplish this, you have to define a custom activity that has a CorrelationProperty instance property and the Workflow Connection Services activities have to bind to this property.
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre dette, må du definere en egendefinert aktivitet som har en CorrelationProperty forekomstegenskap og arbeidsflyten Connection Services aktivitetene har ikke binde til denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property used in the correlation set.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapen som benyttes i korrelasjonen angitt.

trans-unit.source: The value of the correlation set property.
name is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: nameer en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property used in the correlation set.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på egenskapen som benyttes i Korrelasjons-sett.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property used in the correlation set.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapen som benyttes i korrelasjonen angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the correlation set property.
The value of the correlation set property.
